remark.en: Sophmore only. Combine Courses:PE4722、PE3722. Students who attend this course first time have to be approved by the instructor.
remark.ch: 初選者需經教練同意,限大二，與PE4722、PE3722同時訓練;目前為表訂時間，詳細訓練時間請洽教練

goal.en: 1. Through team training and participation in competitions to achieve technical, physical, and sports psychology skills improvement 2. Cultivate personal lifelong sports and team spirit of mutual assistance 3. Learn to organize competitions to assist in the management of various sports competitions in the school
goal.ch: 一.藉由代表隊訓練 參與賽會以達到技術 體能 運動心理技巧進步 二.培養個人之終身運動 與團隊互助之精神 三.學習舉辦賽會以協助校內各項運動賽會之辦理

content.en: Routine training 3-5 times a week. The detailed training plan depends on the training situation of the representative team.
content.ch: 每週3-5次例行練習 詳細訓練計畫是代表隊組訓情形而定

textbook.en: Self-edited teaching materials by team coach

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction Others
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導 其他

domain.en: 基礎體適能與游泳技能 、 單人運動 、 休閒運動
domain.ch: 基礎體適能與游泳技能 、 單人運動 、 休閒運動
